scripts.install:example:solid-start: npm run gen:example:solid-start-app && npm --prefix examples/solid-start install --no-package-lock
scripts.dev:example:solid-start: npm run gen:example:solid-start-app && spago build && npm --prefix examples/solid-start run dev
scripts.test:start: npm run gen:routes && npm run install:example:solid-start && npm run build:example:solid-start && npm run build:example:solid-start-ssr && npm run build:example:start-ssr-smoke && npm run test:start-server-smoke && npm run test:start-browser-smoke && npm run test:start-ssr-hydration-smoke
scripts.test:all: npm run test:purescript && npm run test:browser-smoke
scripts.build:example:todomvc: npm exec --yes --package=esbuild -- spago bundle --module Examples.TodoMVC --bundle-type app --platform browser --outfile dist/examples/todomvc.js
scripts.build:example:counter: npm exec --yes --package=esbuild -- spago bundle --module Examples.Counter --bundle-type app --platform browser --outfile dist/examples/counter.js
scripts.build:example:solid-start: npm run gen:example:solid-start-app && npm --prefix examples/solid-start install --no-package-lock && spago build && npm --prefix examples/solid-start run build
scripts.build:example:solid-start-ssr: npm exec --yes --package=esbuild -- spago bundle --module Examples.SolidStartSSR.Entry.ClientMain --bundle-type app --platform browser --outfile dist/examples/solid-start-ssr-client.js && node scripts/copy-solid-start-ssr-client.mjs
scripts.build:example:start-ssr-smoke: npm exec --yes --package=esbuild -- spago bundle --module Examples.StartSSRSmoke.ClientMain --bundle-type app --platform browser --outfile dist/examples/start-ssr-smoke-client.js
scripts.build:examples: npm run build:example:todomvc && npm run build:example:counter && npm run build:example:solid-start && npm run build:example:solid-start-ssr && npm run build:example:start-ssr-smoke
